name: Super Hen Hunt - Maze for Kids
name_original: Super Hen Hunt - Maze for Kids
description:
At Busy Things we believe that children learn better with laughter! Our dream is to inspire a love of learning in children across the world by combining fun and laughter with the highest quality of curriculum-linked content.
We have been making award-winning educational resources and eduapps for over 10 years now. From Early Years open-ended play to more structured learning in Key Stages 1 and 2 – you can rely on all our activities being filled with fun, humorous characters and lively colourful settings in a safe online environment! Learn more about Busy Things and our products at busythings.co.uk
